title: Star Trek Continues E04 The White Iris RERELEASE WEBRip 720px264
description:
Rerelease of E04 that fixes a timeline issue regarding Kirk's time on the Farragut and his relationship with a crew member from that ship. Original release states 7 years ago; this rerelease states 13 years ago. Dialog change is at 14:13. Grab both releases for completeness. The original 'flubbed' version is no longer available from STC's video page.

Captain Kirk finds himself haunted by guilt from his past as the fate of an alien world hangs in the balance.
